name: it means WHAT?!?
description:
it means WHAT?!? is a version of the dictionary game. The rules of the game are below:

Supplies:

* writing implement for each player

* identical pieces of paper for each player


Rules:

1 The picker for the turn selects a word from the word list provided by the app.

2 Each player writes a crafty and credible definition of the word, initials it, and submits it to the picker.

3 The picker writes the true definition of the word and includes it with the other submissions.

4 The picker shuffles the definitions together.

5 The picker reads through all of the definitions.

6 On the second reading, the players select the definition that they think is correct. The picker does not make a selection.

7 A player may pick his or her definition as a bluff, but will not get points for the selection.

8 The round is scored, and the role of picker goes to the next player.

9 The winner is the first player who reaches 30 points.


Scoring

* Each player gets one point if they selected the correct definition.

* Each player gets one point for every player that selected their definition.

* The picker gets 3 points if no one chose the correct definition.
